description:
Enterprise Architect Lite provides a free viewer for Enterprise Architect models. This read-only edition is intended for distribution with UML models, to staff or to customers. It supports all viewing functions, however document generation and model editing abilities have been disabled.
See all Enterprise Architect free downloads at http://www.sparxsystems.com/products/ea/downloads.html
summary: Enterprise Architect Lite provides a free viewer for Enterprise Architect models.
author: Sparx Systems
